Title: 41969 - # Features to Factor into Your Digital Camera Purchase
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 important features that should factor in to the camera buying process. Write for people who want the latest technology but may not be familiar with all that’s available in the realm of digital cameras. You’re writing for a fairly tech-savvy audience who researches their next buy thoroughly. Include the AT with a mention of some features available with Sony cameras. Try to naturally link to other products without mentioning competitors of Sony.
Anchor Text: best digital cameras branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: Sony has some of the best digital cameras
